# Model parameters

The purpose of this document is to summarize existing knowledge about carbon fluxes from plant biomass through food webs in forests. The Wood-Litter-Light Forest-Biodiversity-Model (WLL-FBM) aims to explain the loss of woody biomass with vital rates of all organisms that rely on trees as primary producers
